content:
# The furnace currently has 13 iron ore and has produced 24 iron plates. It is actively working, which explains why my previous attempt to insert iron ore did not register.
# 
# Since the furnace is already processing iron ore, I will wait for it to finish smelting the current batch before attempting to insert any more iron ore.
# 
# I will monitor the furnace's output until it produces a sufficient number of iron plates.

# Waiting for the smelting process to complete.
for _ in range(20):  # Maximum wait time of 20 seconds
    if inspect_inventory()[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 30:  # Checking if I have at least 30 iron plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an error if smelting didn't finish.

# After that, I will check the inventory again.
